tasks.task_description: Add aggregate flag to RawRootAttributes struct
Add key and aggregate field attributes to RawMetricsFieldAttrs
Update MetricMode enum to include Aggregate mode
Implement aggregation code generation in generate_metrics_for_struct
Create helper functions for generating Key type, Aggregated struct, and trait implementations
Add tests for the new aggregation functionality

description: Implement aggregation proc macro for metrique - add support for #[metrics(aggregate)] with key and aggregate field annotations
context:
Successfully implemented the core aggregation proc macro functionality:
- Added aggregate flag to RawRootAttributes struct
- Added key and aggregate field attributes to RawMetricsFieldAttrs
- Updated MetricMode enum to include Aggregate mode
- Implemented aggregation code generation in generate_metrics_for_struct
- Created generate_aggregation_impls function that generates Key type, Aggregated struct, and trait implementations
- Code compiles successfully

Added test for aggregation functionality and identified issues with generated code:
- Field names are being quoted as strings instead of identifiers
- Key extraction is using quoted field names
- Aggregate calls are using quoted field names
- Entry implementation is using quoted field names
- Need to fix these to use proper identifiers

Successfully fixed field name quoting issues and completed aggregation implementation:
- Fixed field names to use proper identifiers instead of quoted strings
- Added direct Entry implementation for original struct (required by AggregatableEntry trait)
- Aggregation example now compiles and runs successfully
- All functionality working as expected: key extraction, aggregation, and metric output
